quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell
biography: Philosopher & writer who explored the human experience in relation to the universe.

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare
biography: 16th century English playwright & poet widely considered the world's greatest dramatist.

quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
biography: 20th Century French writer, poet & aviator best known for his novel The Little Prince.

quote: Love is not blind; it simply enables one to see things others fail to see.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us.
author: Paulo Coelho
biography: Brazilian lyricist and novelist whose works explore spiritual themes such as love and personal growth.

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost
biography: American poet who won four Pulitzer Prizes for his works.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs
biography: Co-founder and former CEO of Apple Inc., entrepreneur and inventor who revolutionized the computer and technology industry.

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
biography: 26th President of the United States, writer and explorer.

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker
biography: Austrian-born American management consultant, educator and author.

quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
author: Edmund Burke
biography: 18th-century British statesman, author, orator, political theorist, and philosopher.

quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
author: Albert Einstein
biography: Theoretical physicist who is widely regarded as the greatest scientist of the 20th century.
